data.title: Cloud Engineer
data.summary: Built a microservice application responsible for transporting and supervising logs.  Manage Kubernetes clusters and maintain Docker containers.  Write Go code capable of sending logs across network layers.

data.title: Fullstack Software Engineer
data.summary: Worked on a variety number of projects from frontend to backend to mobile apps.  Consulted on a number of teams providing Agile experience.  Focused primarily on user-facing products.

data.title: Software Engineering Intern
data.summary: Assisted in building project reports for end users.  Shadowed with experienced software engineers learning about agile methodologies.  Refactored and optimized scripts for deployment purposes.
